item.title: Change the default - stop a crash-out Brexit
item.description: When Parliament returns, we need to change the default from crash-out no deal Brexit to Revoking Article 50 and remaining in the EU. There is no majority in the country or Parliament for a damaging crash-out Brexit, but there is a lot of disagreement on what we should do instead. Accordingly the first thing Parliament, or any new interim PM should do is pass a Bill to prevent an accidental Crash Out Brexit.

item.title: Sign up for the Party
item.description: You should already have your invitation in the post. If you haven’t seen it or lost it, look it up here. Next, make an event for it - on Facebook, or by email - and invite your friends and neighbours. This is the one I made for my polling station - make one for your own.
